DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate efficacy , tolerability safety two fixed dos vortioxetine treatment major depressive disorder .
DOC.brief_title: Randomised Placebo-controlled Duloxetine-referenced Study Efficacy Safety 15 20 mg Vortioxetine ( Lu AA21004 ) Acute Treatment Major Depressive Disorder Adults
